00025 #ifndef __LOW_PASS_FILTER_H
00026 #define __LOW_PASS_FILTER_H
00027 
00031 struct LowPassFilterContext
00032 {
00033    int RC;         
00034    int alpha1000;  
00035    int lastOutput; 
00036 };
00037 
00043 void
00044 LowPassFilterInit (LowPassFilterContext &context, int RC, int samplingRate)
00045 {
00046     context.RC = RC;
00047     /* alpha scaled by 1000 for int ops */
00048     context.alpha1000 = (RC * samplingRate * 1000)/(RC * samplingRate + 1);
00049     context.lastOutput = -1;
00050 }
00051 
00056 int
00057 LowPassFilter (LowPassFilterContext &context, int sampleInput)
00058 {
00059     if (context.lastOutput < 0)
00060         context.lastOutput = sampleInput;
00061     else
00062         context.lastOutput = context.lastOutput + context.alpha1000 * (sampleInput - context.lastOutput);
00063     context.lastOutput /= 1000; /* Scaled down from int ops */
00064     return context.lastOutput;
00065 }
00066 
00067 #endif
